mapper.sql: id, title, class1, class2, class3, no_order, imgurl, top, recommend, hits, updatetime, addtime, issue, access, links, del
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cms_img WHERE del=0
AND class1 = #{class1}
ORDER BY top DESC, recommend DESC, no_order DESC, updatetime DESC
mapper.insert: insert into cms_img (id, title, class1, class2, class3, imgurl, top, recommend, hits, updatetime, addtime, issue, links) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{class1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{class2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{class3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{top,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NOW(), #{issue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{links,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
